overview:
Jeff Fernandez is Cofounder and CEO of Grovo, the web service that makes it easy for people to use the best websites and mobile applications.

Before Grovo, Jeff was a Product Manager at Clickable, a web service that brings simplicity to online advertising. He worked on Clickable’s flagship product, Clickable Pro, and helped integrate Facebook advertising and launch the largest SEM partnership in the space. Jeff left Clickable to launch Grovo in July 2010. Before Clickable, Jeff joined Doostang in May 2006 as its second employee, where he worked with the founding team to raise its Series A financing from Shasta Ventures and launch its New York office. Jeff headed sales and business development until February 2009, when he joined the company’s Advisory Board. Jeff graduated from Harvard College in 2005 with Highest Honors and published his thesis, “Coaches Motivational Techniques and Individual Athletic Performance” with the International Institute for Sport and Human Performance in the Kinesiology Publications.
